trans-unit.source: Interacts with the parser to build a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Interactúa con el analizador para compilar un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" />.

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily for control developers.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase se utiliza principalmente para los programadores de controles.

trans-unit.source: To create a custom control builder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> derived control, you need to inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: Para crear un generador de controles personalizados para un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> derivado de control, se debe heredar de esta clase.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the control builder should process the white space literals that are represented by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el generador de controles debe procesar los literales de espacio en blanco que se representan mediante el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method overrides the inherited implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to always indicate that white spaces in the text that are associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control are not represented by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> método reemplaza la implementación heredada de la <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para indicar siempre que blanco espacios en el texto que están asociados a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control no están representadas por <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal?displayProperty=nameWithType> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The content to add to the control.
trans-unit.target: Contenido que se va a agregar al control.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified literal content to a control.
trans-unit.target: Agrega el contenido literal especificado a un control.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString(System.String)" /> method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
trans-unit.target: El marco de trabajo de las páginas ASP.NET llama al método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AppendLiteralString(System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: If the string is white space, it is handled according to the setting of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si la cadena es un espacio en blanco, se trata según la configuración de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is treated as if the inner text represents the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, se trata como si el texto interno representa los <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The string literal is not well formed.
trans-unit.target: El literal de cadena no es correcto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder" /> object to add the child control builders to.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder" /> al que se van a agregar los generadores de controles secundarios.

trans-unit.source: Throws <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpException" />, because adding child control builders does not apply to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Produce la excepción <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpException" />, porque agregar generadores de control secundario no es válido para el control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" />.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> base class, this method adds the builders of all child controls associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control to the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=nameWithType> object.
trans-unit.target: En el <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> clase base, este método agrega los generadores de todos los controles secundarios asociados a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=nameWithType> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=nameWithType> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Este método se hereda de la <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder?displayProperty=nameWithType> clase y no es aplicable a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: In the overridden implementation in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>, the method always throws <xref:System.Web.HttpException>.
trans-unit.target: En la implementación invalidada en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralControlBuilder>, el método siempre produce una excepción <xref:System.Web.HttpException>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to use this method.
trans-unit.target: Se ha intentado utilizar este método.
